Reviews.Title: “Disgusting hotel”

Reviews.Content: terrible hotel ive bad strange smell bathroom lot bathroom curtain shower water stopping device shower water run floor bath extractor fan steam remain bathroom breakfast poor hardboiled eggs baked jams cheeses hotel doesnt accept credit cards accept cash internet lobby hotel location close main attractions

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Albion Boutique in Sultanahmet is very OK!”
Reviews.Author: feelena
Reviews.Content: im regular traveler times travel stand thats couldnt reserved nov 5 9 11 daughter checked hotel albion hotel choice standby arrived proceeded theremy 3 12 days stay fine people reception friendly helpful touristic pointers regular basic clean location hotel greatright sultanahmet walking distances istanbul world incredible sites

Reviews.Title: “Unclean and outdated”
Reviews.Author: normerc
Reviews.Content: hotel bathroom smelt dank unclean husband splinter foot wood shavings floor covered dirty stained carpet looks owners basically bothered improving building worth money stayed night

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Ok Room, Eat out for breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Ickerax
Reviews.Content: giving 4 5 based purely location 10 mins walk 5 major atractions aya sofia palace cistern bazaar museum basic satelite tv empty fridge storing drinks bed nights sleep bathroom tiny 2 gripes wifi didnt reach top floor staying bring laptop lounge lots tables cushions sit ok breakfast day basic range stuff sheet paper buy cooked items extra summary probably wont hotel location price prepared eat breakfast time

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: jane2625
Reviews.Content: visited istanbul march stayed albion hotelthis hotel excellent location near tourist clean nicely fantastic helpful travelled children staff time usthe hotel manager welcoming hotel perfect stay istanbul definately recommend hotel
